About Blog

That's me on a good-hair day. I have lived through the heydays of the internet when blogging was hip, Facebook and Twitter were cool and social media was sociable.

 

In those days of yore, one would not just skim over the headlines but read through the discourse to inform oneself. This site, thus, is my (second) attempt to help you find interesting content beneath the headlines.

 

If the prose sinks you in a sea of ennui, perhaps you'd find my other creative streams more interesting.
